nodes.text: Troithe was a planet in the Cerberon system of the Deep Core. As a ecumenopolis, it once rivaled the Galactic Republic capital world of Coruscant as the government's jewel, centuries before the Galactic Civil War. The New Republic, including the pilots of Alphabet Squadron, attempted to take over the planet during the Troithe operation.
Troithe appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
